content: I recall there being a way to check whether a constant in the environment is auto-generated, but I can't seem to find it. Is there a built-in function that takes in a name and possibly an environment and returns whether it corresponds to an auto-generated declaration?
There is Name.isInternal which is some approximation of this.
Thank you very much! I think this is exactly what I was looking for. I had assumed that it was a function of a ConstantInfo for some reason.
Anand Rao Tadipatri has marked this topic as resolved.
